  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="5672" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="5672" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.29</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="255">255</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="47"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Douro</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Douro</b> was launched in 2004. The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Pickthall. Top notes are Lemon, Lavender, Lime, Basil, Geranium and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Neroli and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Oakmoss, Musk, Labdanum and Sandalwood. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html" target="_blank"     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2190837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190837" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Docplaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466731.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Docplaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466731">Docplaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts out with a blast of herbs and citrus and dries down to a very refined soapy scent. Unfortunately, I discovered this fragrance too late, as it is discontinued. I will relish the little amount I have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="2190837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=2190837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059025" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="duftagut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183976"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1183976.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="duftagut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183976">duftagut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 08:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not too familiar with english sophistication - not the tailors of Bond Street, nor the tweedy fox hunters of The Dales. But I do know a fair bit of Lusitania and if something ever could claim the name Eau de Portugal, this must be it.<br />
The dry lavender, the soft citrus blossoms, the damp moss - they all smell natural and of highest quality. Solid but smooth and toned down, like um senhor portugus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="2059025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=2059025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943589" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bolancb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bolancb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Amber-Pour-Homme-Intense-11240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"title="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838">bolancb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 18:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MASTERPIECE!!!!!! THEY DONT MAKE THEM LIKE THIS ANYMORE. THIS BAD BOY HAS BIG COJONES </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1943589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1943589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="F2097"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="F2097" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009212">F2097</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No longer discontinued, it's back from the beyond in 2023. Is now made in Spain though at the main PUIG factory rather than using a UK supplier. Penhaligons was UK made from the 1870 until 2022. Not sure if all of them are going to be like this onwards. Nothing wrong with making things abroad but seems  hypocritical for a brand that trades on its Britishness and also highlights how penhaligons of today is literally just a fairly meaningless label. Also it is almost twice the price it used to be.<br />
<br />
Despite the change of location it's pretty faithful to the original and remains a classic scent. Have always enjoyed this. Think it is a lovely sporty fragrance. Beautifully balanced. Smells like summertime; playing fields, that kind of musty linen smell of the wooden equipment coming out of storage under the sun. It's a classic. I would mark this above Blenheim but below Hamman. This is one of the best classic English fragrances, although it's no longer in any way authentic it still smells the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1903653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1903653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869530" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Riceasnice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661590"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1661590.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Riceasnice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Vetiver-Sensuel-61046.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61046.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver Sensuel"title="Vetiver Sensuel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661590">Riceasnice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-02">07/02/23 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely gorgeous for 15 minutes, however the dry down just smells like lavender. Goes from citrus blast to grandma's handbag. Real shame as the first 15 minutes are as close to perfect as I've found.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1869530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1869530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1857185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jon St"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554844"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jon St" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554844">Jon St</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely superb traditional men's Cologne. Ultra classy. And with its Basil note making it really interesting. As good as a fragrance can get</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1857185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1857185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802791" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="M.Valle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662889"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662889.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="M.Valle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662889">M.Valle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A gentleman's scent, fresh, full and spicy. For an eau de cologne it has a remarkable persistence, staying on my skin for 5+ hours. A classic old-fashioned fougere, but it doesn't smell like a perfume my Grandfaher would have worn, it reminds me of something like an old luxury watch that has been passed down for generations and always remains charming and intriguing. For the lovers of citrusy and spicy fragrances with an old-fashioned flavor it's definitely one to have in the collection. Too bad Penhaligon's discontinued it. I personally prefer Douro to Blenheim Bouquet, for my taste it's more captivating while Blenheim is more classic. It is a purely masculine fragrance, I can see it working well in both a young man who dresses classically and a wealthy mature man. Personally I will use it this summer even in a T-shirt, but I'm not to be taken as an example, I love it. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1802791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1802791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749180" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="andrew1983"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1089141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="andrew1983" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749180ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749180" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089141">andrew1983</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A masculine cologne, a spicy fougere, fresh, energic and very very elegant, unfortunetely discontinued by Penhaligon's, like the other masterpieces English Fern (a greener fougere, on the same wave of Douro) and Hammam Bouquet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1749180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1749180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1742159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1742159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gary McGhee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/450125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.450125.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gary McGhee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/New-York-Intense-28180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New York Intense"title="New York Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1742159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1742159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/450125">Gary McGhee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-24">01/24/23 09:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wearing Douro as I write. One of my favourites that I've been wearing for years.This and Sartorial are the quintessential, masculine fragrances from this House, though the latter is more suited to smart formal wear. Both would suit the discerning gentleman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1742159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1742159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1597633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1597633" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yaya24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/181975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.181975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yaya24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1597633ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1597633" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/181975">yaya24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-06">07/06/22 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple , manly+30 &amp; clean.<br />
Remineds me of a modern version of <br />
Chanel pour monsieur(1955) + loewe pour homme (1974).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1597633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1597633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1584419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1584419" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rogerant"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rogerant" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1584419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1584419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479933">Rogerant</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-14">06/14/22 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is something very ethereal about this fragrance. Really loud at the opening with citrus but middle notes and dry down really take you on a journey. Its fougere will still having some body to it. Good performance for a cologne. Like most of penhaligons more you wear it the more you come to appreciate it. Definitely one of my favourites from this house. Can be a little heavy for full summer day but a confident scent for spring or autumn glad I managed  to pick it up before it discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1584419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1584419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1583233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malikun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1134937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="malikun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Fleur-de-Peau-Eau-de-Parfum-48681.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48681.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"title="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1583233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1583233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134937">malikun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just bought a sample randomly, I thought it was a female fragrance. When I first sniffed it on my skin and for next 1-2 hours I felt that it was very acidic, cat piss-like and hated it. But after hours Douro settled into the skin it became so good Truly masculine, high class, how you would imagine a celebrity smells like. I would definitely buy something like this for my husband if he was into perfumes, I don't think he would appreciate me splurging so much just to spray him for my own olfactory recreation. But who knows, might need to try ;) Update: I tested it on him and luckily didnt like it, smelled like a regular after shave</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5672"comment_id="1583233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html?ccid=1583233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
